body:
I tried building it several times today, too. I used cmake with VS2017 and cmake with Ninja.
The full message from the command prompt using ninja:

[1/1] Linking CXX executable gen_hpack_tables.exe
FAILED: gen_hpack_tables.exe
cmd.exe /C "cd . && "C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E vs_link_exe --intdir=CMakeFiles\gen_hpack_tables.dir --manifests  -- C:\PROGRA~2\MICROS~1\2017\ENTERP~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1412~1.258\bin\Hostx64\x64\link.exe /nologo CMakeFiles\gen_hpack_tables.dir\tools\codegen\core\gen_hpack_tables.c.obj  /out:gen_hpack_tables.exe /implib:gen_hpack_tables.lib /pdb:gen_hpack_tables.pdb /version:0.0  /machine:x64 /INCREMENTAL:NO /subsystem:console  gpr.lib grpc.lib gpr.lib wsock32.lib third_party\boringssl\ssl\ssl.lib third_party\boringssl\crypto\crypto.lib third_party\zlib\zlibstatic.lib third_party\cares\cares\lib\cares.lib ws2_32.lib kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib && cd ."
LINK: command "C:\PROGRA~2\MICROS~1\2017\ENTERP~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1412~1.258\bin\Hostx64\x64\link.exe /nologo CMakeFiles\gen_hpack_tables.dir\tools\codegen\core\gen_hpack_tables.c.obj /out:gen_hpack_tables.exe /implib:gen_hpack_tables.lib /pdb:gen_hpack_tables.pdb /version:0.0 /machine:x64 /INCREMENTAL:NO /subsystem:console gpr.lib grpc.lib gpr.lib wsock32.lib third_party\boringssl\ssl\ssl.lib third_party\boringssl\crypto\crypto.lib third_party\zlib\zlibstatic.lib third_party\cares\cares\lib\cares.lib ws2_32.lib kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib /MANIFEST /MANIFESTFILE:gen_hpack_tables.exe.manifest" failed (exit code 1120) with the following output:
gen_hpack_tables.c.obj : error LNK2019: Verweis auf nicht aufgel├╖stes externes Symbol "grpc_chttp2_huffsyms" in Funktion "build_dec_tbl".
gen_hpack_tables.exe : fatal error LNK1120: 1 nicht aufgel├╖ste Externe
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
Fix is in #13756, thanks for the catch
